comment.author: 8442333@N05
comment._content: This is a monument to Confederate women. Sculpted by Augustus Lukeman. Dedicated June 10, 1914.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Lukeman is best remembered for his work on the colossal Confederate Memorial at Stone Mountain, Georgia.

comment.author: 8442333@N05
comment._content:
Thank you for pointing that out, Wystan. The Stone Mountain monument was conceived of in 1912, work was begun in 1923, and completed in 1972.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/peterkaminski/5928298/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
"Mr. DeMille, we're ready for our close-up."
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/peterkaminski/5928318/in/photostream/]
